title: The Mammoth Book of Erotica
description: A glorious celebration of sensual love from the most exciting modern writers.Gathered together here in one splendid volume are erotic masterpieces of many kinds. Maxim Jakubowski takes you on a thrilling unexpurgated journey through the gardens of sensual delights that is the literature of sex.This book will educate, excite, surprise and instruct as you read the greatest writing of one of love's finest scribes, including Kathy Acker, Clive Barker, Leonard Cohen, Adam-Troy Castro, Anne Rice, Marco Vassi and man, many more ...
author: Maxim Jakubowski
